name: Journey Through Hell: Browser
description:
Journey Through Hell  is a free 3D platformer game with a beautiful low poly graphics.

Story

After burning in Hell for decades, Hitler takes a few days off from Hell officials to see other parts of Hell.

Game Features

  • Beautiful low poly environment
  • Fun and challenging 3D platformer gameplay
  • Easy to pick up and play
  • Funny and strange 

Windows (Downloadable) version with higher graphics:

https://hammergamesb.itch.io/journey-through-hell
